metadata.title: CVE-2014-9018 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Icecast before 2.4.1 transmits the output of the on-connect script, whichmight allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information, related toshared file descriptors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9018` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icecast2 - 2.3.3-2ubuntu1.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icecast2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.3-2ubuntu1.14.04.1').
